about.title: Our Legacy
about.description:
Kyaw Kyar Car Showroom first opened on 23 March 2018. From the day we opened until today, we have stood firm and sold with full transparency, responsibility, and accountability, always putting kindness first toward every customer who has bought from us.

Kyaw Kyar Car Showroom sells every vehicle with a 100% guarantee that it is completely free of accidents, license issues, and any liens or encumbrances. If you wish to sell back a car you bought from us, we will buy it back at market price at any time.

Thank you very much.
U Kyaw Kyar

warranty.desc: Buy back at the current market price

checklist.pricing: Transparent pricing with no hidden fees

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.subtitle: To own a quality car exactly as you wish...
contact.description: Our team is ready and waiting to fulfill your needs with the highest level of service. You can reach out to us through your preferred method or we warmly invite you to visit our showrooms to explore our collection in person.
